children.content: Static analysis of critical embedded software
Microsoft Research   August 2007   How does ASTRÉE deals with digital filters?   (65 minutes)
INRIA Paris-Rocquencourt   April 2015   Réduction de modèles de voies de signalisation intracellulaire   (37 minutes)
ENS   Octobre 2015   Réduction de modèles de voies de signalisation intracellulaire   (52 minutes)
Imperial College   April 2016   An overview of the ASTRÉE/ASTRÉEA static analyzer   (45 minutes)
Équipe Antique   DI - École Normale Supérieure   45, rue d'Ulm   75 230 Paris Cedex 05 --- France
I am interested in static analysis by the means of Abstract Interpretation:
static analysis of critical embedded systems (ASTREE analyzer)
static analysis of biological networks (Executable Knowledge / Kappa language)
I am coordinating the ANR project AnaStaSec, on the analysis of security properties in critical embedded software.
I lead the INRIA-Paris partner team in the ANR project DCore, on Causal debugging for concurrent systems.
I lead the INRIA-Paris partner team in The ITMO Cancer project TGFSysBio coordinated by Nathalie Théret (IRSET (Université Rennes 1))
Tenth International Workshop on Static Analysis and Systems Biology - SASB 2019   October 8, 2019, Porto, Portugal   (PC member)
Twenty-sixth Static Analysis Symposium - SAS 2019   October 9--11, 2019, Porto, Portugal   (attendent)
Seventh Workshop on Hybrid Systems and Biology - HSB 2020   April 15--16, 2020, Vienna, Austria   (PC Member)
Mehdi Bouaziz (PhD student, Research Engineer, Facebook)

Alessandro Romanel (Post-doc 2011, Assistant professor, Trento university)
